message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take $6,000, you get $4,000.  Consider the inflation working against you.
I'll take a bit more, considering I'm losing value each round
The clock is ticking, Bob. I'll take a little less this time, but don't push it any further.
I'm willing to take a risk, despite the inflation. Meet me in the middle or walk away
This is getting ridiculous, Bob.  Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
